contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 19, 2014 D Pogson Bray Entertainment Contest
Pogson Bray Entertainment Contest 5 Entertainments Contest Pogson Bray pogson-bray-entertainment-contest
Entertainments Contest
Berties Bistro, Elland, West Yorkshire, England, UK Those bands with a * next to their name have had penalties deducted for going over the allotted time.
Those bands with a + have had extra penalties for other rule infringements.
Where penalties applied has meant a tie in the overall marks, the marks given by the adjudicator took precedent.
If anyone from the competing Bands could kindly forward details of the pieces that were played Title, Composer/Arranger - Soloist details and any relevant info I will gladly add to the site, for future reference
Oct. 1, 2014, 12:39 p.m. Oct. 21, 2014, 2:48 p.m.
1 Elland Silver Band Danny Brooks
2 Slaithwaite Band Rob Westacott
3 Lindley Band Jessica Tredrea
4 Lofthouse 2000 Brass Band Andrew Whitaker
5 Skelmanthorpe Prospect Brass Phil Garlick
6 Huddersfield and Ripponden Brass Helen Williams
7 Clifton & Lightcliffe 'B' Band David Crisp
8 Deepcar Brass Band Jonathan Beatty
9 Kirklees Youth Alex Kenyon
10 Linthwaite Silver Band Tony Jaeger-Fozard
11 Huddersfield Youth Brass Alan Jazwinski
12 Friendly Band (Sowerby Bridge) Neil Robinson
13 Thurcroft Welfare Mathew Wright
14 Thurlstone Brass Band Graham Bates
